apiDescription:
Postmark makes sending and receiving email
incredibly easy.
metaDescription: Send transactional and marketing emails and get them to the inbox on time, every time. Postmark is a fast and reliable email delivery service for developers.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of bounces to return per request. Max 500.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of bounces to skip.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter by type of bounce

parameters.name: inactive
parameters.description: Filter by emails that were deactivated by Postmark due to the bounce. Set to true or false. If this isn't specified it will return both active and inactive.

parameters.name: emailFilter
parameters.description: Filter by email address

parameters.name: messageId
parameters.description: Filter by messageID

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: Filter by tag

parameters.name: todate
parameters.description: Filter messages up to the date specified. e.g. `2014-02-01`

parameters.name: fromdate
parameters.description: Filter messages starting from the date specified. e.g. `2014-02-01`

parameters.name: bounceid
parameters.description: The ID of the bounce to retrieve.

parameters.name: bounceid
parameters.description: The ID of the Bounce to activate.

parameters.name: bounceid
parameters.description: The ID for the bounce dump to retrieve.

responses.description: The standard response when a postmark message is sent

methods.description: Send a batch of email using templates.
Send an email using a Template

responses.description: The standard response when a postmark message is sent

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of messages to return per request. Max 500.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of messages to skip

parameters.name: recipient
parameters.description: Filter by the user who was receiving the email

parameters.name: fromemail
parameters.description: Filter by the sender email address

parameters.name: subject
parameters.description: Filter by email subject

parameters.name: mailboxhash
parameters.description: Filter by mailboxhash

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: Filter by tag

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by status (`blocked`, `processed`, `queued`, `failed`, `scheduled`)

parameters.name: todate
parameters.description: Filter messages up to the date specified. e.g. `2014-02-01`

parameters.name: fromdate
parameters.description: Filter messages starting from the date specified. e.g. `2014-02-01`

methods.description: Bypass rules for a blocked inbound message

parameters.name: messageid
parameters.description: The ID of the message which should bypass inbound rules.

parameters.name: messageid
parameters.description: The ID of the message for which to details will be retrieved.

methods.description: Retry a failed inbound message for processing

parameters.name: messageid
parameters.description: The ID of the inbound message on which we should retry processing.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of messages to return per request. Max 500.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of messages to skip

parameters.name: recipient
parameters.description: Filter by the user who was receiving the email

parameters.name: fromemail
parameters.description: Filter by the sender email address

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: Filter by tag

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by status (`queued` or `sent`)

parameters.name: todate
parameters.description: Filter messages up to the date specified. e.g. `2014-02-01`

parameters.name: fromdate
parameters.description: Filter messages starting from the date specified. e.g. `2014-02-01`

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of message clicks to return per request. Max 500.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of messages to skip

parameters.name: recipient
parameters.description: Filter by To, Cc, Bcc

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: Filter by tag

parameters.name: clientName
parameters.description: Filter by client name, i.e. Outlook, Gmail

parameters.name: clientCompany
parameters.description: Filter by company, i.e. Microsoft, Apple, Google

parameters.name: clientFamily
parameters.description: Filter by client family, i.e. OS X, Chrome

parameters.name: osName
parameters.description: Filter by full OS name and specific version, i.e. OS X 10.9 Mavericks, Windows 7

parameters.name: osFamily
parameters.description: Filter by kind of OS used without specific version, i.e. OS X, Windows

parameters.name: osCompany
parameters.description: Filter by company which produced the OS, i.e. Apple Computer, Inc., Microsoft Corporation

parameters.name: platform
parameters.description: Filter by platform, i.e. webmail, desktop, mobile

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Filter by country messages were opened in, i.e. Denmark, Russia

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: Filter by full name of region messages were opened in, i.e. Moscow, New York

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: Filter by full name of region messages were opened in, i.e. Moscow, New York

parameters.name: messageid
parameters.description: The ID of the Outbound Message for which click statistics should be retrieved.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of message clicks to return per request. Max 500.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of messages to skip.

methods.description: Get the Templates associated with this Server

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of Templates to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of Templates to "skip" before returning results.

parameters.name: templateIdOrAlias
parameters.description: The 'TemplateID' or 'Alias' value for the Template you wish to delete.

parameters.name: templateIdOrAlias
parameters.description: The 'TemplateID' or 'Alias' value for the Template you wish to retrieve.

parameters.name: templateIdOrAlias
parameters.description: The 'TemplateID' or 'Alias' value for the Template you wish to update.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of records to return per request.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of records to skip.

parameters.name: triggerid
parameters.description: The ID of the Inbound Rule that should be deleted.

repositoryDescription: Send transactional and marketing emails and get them to the inbox on time, every time. Postmark is a fast and reliable email delivery service for developers. Postmark's {language} SDK generated by Konfig (https://konfigthis.com/).
typescriptSdkFirstRequestCode:
// Get bounces
const listBouncesResponse = postmark.Bounces API.listBounces({
    count: 0
    offset: 0
    type: undefined
    inactive: undefined
    emailFilter: undefined
    messageId: undefined
    tag: undefined
    todate: undefined
    fromdate: undefined
})
